CustomField.description: ** System Calculated Required Override ** The maximum number of "Assignments" aka "Subscribers" allowed for "Assignment" against the Subscription is derived from the related "Subscription" Item "Maximum Number of Assignments" field.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: ** System Calculated Required Override ** The maximum number of "Assignments" aka "Subscribers" allowed for "Assignment" against the Subscription is derived from the related "Subscription" Item "Maximum Number of Assignments" field.
CustomField.label: zDEPRACATED
